PACKAG 
 IDENT main
SCOLON 
  FUNC 
 IDENT main
LPAREN 
RPAREN 
LPAREN 
RPAREN 
LBRACE 
   VAR 
 IDENT i
   I32 i32
SCOLON 
   FOR 
BOOLLT true
LBRACE 
 IDENT i
  ASGN =
INTLIT 55
SCOLON 
 BREAK 
SCOLON 
RBRACE 
SCOLON 
 IDENT printf
LPAREN 
STRLIT i : %d

 COMMA 
 IDENT i
RPAREN 
SCOLON 
 IDENT test
LPAREN 
 IDENT i
 COMMA 
INTLIT 55
 COMMA 
STRLIT 
RPAREN 
SCOLON
